name: Chicago Type Specimen Booklet
desc: A booklet on the Macintosh Chicago typeface that mimics the classic MacOS UI.

name: The Library of Babel
desc: A custom-typeset copy of the short story by Jorge Luis Borges with illustrations.

name: Memphis Type
desc: A typeface designed with abstract 3D shapes for a retro postmodern design.

name: LEAF Spellcheck Poster
desc: A poster for a fictional Cold War spellcheck program with an emphasis on future-retro design
